name: AIRism Sleeveless Bra Top
fabric: Shell: 62% Polyester, 29% Cupro, 9% Spandex/ Lining: 75% Nylon, 25% Spandex/ Cup (Inner Lining): 100% Polyester
details: Flattering and comfortable fit. So smooth, you’ll never want to take it off.- Packed with comfort features to keep you feeling fresh.- Great stretch and a smooth feel.- Updated shoulder width provides more gentle support.- Hem design with no under-bust band at the back.- All-over support ensures cups stay in place.- Flattering scoop neckline.
review_description: It’s a shame that even when after 13 years purchased much Uniqlo pieces I realized all the underwear I bought were the panties were perfect and they don’t sell anymore and not even one expensive bra or bra tops fitted. The is was literally the very last one just a shame because as Uniqlo and the crazy’s return policies online I had such horrible experience that never have even tried to return anything else wasting the money and feeling bad until stop going to Uniqlo completely since they seem to be doing an effort to get rid of brand loyalty retiring any of their items you might like.

Love these bra top, dressed up or down, for all seasons. I have been purchasing the cotton ones for a few years, however recently only Airism ones are available. The Airism material isn’t as comfortable as cotton, especially for a fitted tank. Please bring back cotton bra tank options.

I ordered 3 in same size and color as the prior style, thinking I would love the improved styling. I wore the new style for 4 weeks through multiple washes and discovered why I was always pulling down on the bra top. The support is no longer there! I wanted to like the no elastic band in the back, but that is precisely what I loved about the original style. Sorry this was a disappointment.

name: AIRism Sleeveless Slip
details: Updated with a slightly longer length. Perfect as an inner layer under a dress.- Smooth AIRism fabric is packed with comfort features.- Perfect as an inner layer under a dress.- A soft and smooth slip that lets outer layers shine.- Inner layer stays hidden thanks to the neckline’s precise cut.- Adjustable straps.- Sleek fit under outer layers.

name: AIRism Ultra Seamless Bikini (Mame Kurogouchi)
details: Meticulously cut for a flattering fit. Seamless design stays hidden under outer layers.A collaboration item with Mame Kurogouchi, a Japanese fashion brand whose beauty of design to enhance every woman’s body is attracting attention all over the world.- Regular shorts with a charming cut.- Bonding design stays hidden under outer layers.
review_description: I usually enjoy underwear by Uniqlo, especially collaborated ones with Mame. But this one has a peculiar design. The airsim fabric is soft to the touch, but it kept sliding all over the place and ended up riding up.

The finishing lining on the leg openings it’s uncomfortable. It makes a strong panty line. Nothing like the previous airs ultra seamless bikini. It isn’t seamless . Also the fabric feels less elastic. I hope the previous version becomes available again.
Love the new Mame Kurogouchi collection! Buying the panties with the matching plunging wireless bra was the best purchase I've made. So comfy and smooth.

name: AIRism Ultra Seamless Bikini
details: Smooth and comfortable AIRism shorts. Stays hidden under your outerwear, so you can wear thin garments with no worries.-Smooth AIRism fabric featuring DRY technology.- Seamless and simple design that stays hidden under your outerwear.
review_description: Reviewed via incentivized campaign
Reviewed via incentivized campaign

name: Ribbed Cropped Sleeveless Bra Top
fabric: Shell: 91% Cotton, 9% Spandex/ Lining: 94% Cotton, 6% Spandex/ Cup(Inner Lining): 100% Polyester
details: This stylish bra top looks great on its own or layered. Sleek design flatters the neckline and waist.- Wide-ribbed cotton-based fabric.- Flattering cut showcases the shoulders and decolletage.- A bra top for a sophisticated style.- Sleek cropped length.
review_description: I love this top so much! I bought it a couple months ago in store and I wear it all the time. Fits well and is very comfortable. I hope uniqlo comes out with more of these!

I love a bra tank that is meant for normal /casual wear rather than athleisure. And this bra insert is well designed to be supportive yet comfortable. I hope that uniqlo makes more casual tops with this bra feature!
I LOVE this top. I bought my usual size in 2 colors, and it's always the first top I wear after I do laundry. The built in bra makes it really comfortable.

name: AIRism Ultra Seamless Bikini
details: Smooth and comfortable AIRism shorts. Stays hidden under your outerwear, so you can wear thin garments with no worries.- Smooth AIRism fabric featuring DRY technology.- Seamless and simple design that stays hidden under your outerwear.
review_description: This is a great seamless underwear. It gets really unnoticeable under clothes, and stays in place all day long.

I got my usual size M but they are way too low cut comparing to the bikinis from other brands that I have. it almost feels like they are too small even though they don't dig in. The material feels wonderful.

I really like Unqlo's airism panties! Over the years I have enjoyed the basic panty in LARGE (Note: I normally wear a SMALL but learned the sizing difference with my very first order!). The basic panties are great, decided to try the hip hugger style but I think the basics are best for a "mature" woman! Please try the basic style if you haven't before, just purchase two sizes larger than normal.

name: AIRism Plunging Bra Slip (Mame Kurogouchi)
fabric: Body: 78% Nylon, 22% Spandex/ Lining: 85% Nylon, 15% Spandex/ Cup (Inner Lining): 87% Polyester, 13% Spandex
details: A bra slip with an elegant design. Smooth AIRism fabric.A collaboration item with Mame Kurogouchi, a Japanese fashion brand whose beauty of design to enhance every woman’s body is attracting attention all over the world.- Featuring AIRism technology.- An elegant cut with meticulously designed details, including exquisite shoulder straps with gold colored adjusters.
review_description: Beautiful item, great material and design. Please keep making this as a staple just like the Airism bra camis but for dressier low cut. I got both the plunging cami and slip, they fit me like a glove with pushup. For reference I am 32A slim and the XS is the right size, tight getting on and off but once it’s on everything fits as it should. Great for that comfortable extra layer, the Airism material keeps me cool and warm at the same time. Material and design is gorgeous. However don’t like Uniqlo’s return policy that we cannot bring items to return at local store and I think they said no returns on undergarments even with tags? This will effect my future purchasing greatly because items like these are not available at my local store to try on. Luckily everything fit me this time, but I don’t think I will order online in the future.

This is EXACTLY what I was looking for. Bought the brown (would've preferred a peach color) in Medium. The length would be better 1/2 inch shorter; the bra fits perfectly—but the band portion is really tight. I'm hoping it eases up with washing and wearing. The slip part is so ultra-clingy that it only offers opacity, zero smoothing.

name: AIRism Plunging Camisole Bra Top (Mame Kurogouchi)
fabric: Body: 78% Nylon, 22% Spandex/ Lining: 85% Nylon, 15% Spandex/ Cup (Inner Lining): 87% Polyester, 13% Spandex
details: Combines the comfortable feel of AIRism with an elegant design.A collaboration item with Mame Kurogouchi, a Japanese fashion brand whose beauty of design to enhance every woman’s body is attracting attention all over the world.- Made with AIRism fabric.- An elegant cut with meticulously designed details, including exquisite shoulder straps with gold colored adjusters.
review_description: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and design of this item. I bought the XS and fits me like a glove, no gaps and provides pushup as well. For reference I am 32A and while it is a bit tight getting on and off, once it is on it feels good, not too constrained. I usually wear Uniqlo bra camis and those are super comfy but this is second best for any low cut tops and a dressier undergarment. I also got the slip which keeps me warmer in dresses indoors with AC, yet cool when it’s hot outside because of the Airism material. Beautiful item and the color is a good color underneath. For the reviewer that commented about the stain, if you spot clean, it does leave a terrible water stain. But once washed, it was like new. I would buy more but did not realize Uniqlo changed their policy about returning in-store, and not sure how they regard this item even with tags as undergarment that cannot be returned. I lucked out everything I ordered fit but I hesitate ordering anything else now.
It fits great. I don’t like to feel squeezed in. I also need adjustable straps and they’re very secure despite being silky. It’s well made. Will buy more colors.

This bra top is better suited for B cup. For a 32AA-A there was gapping and shifting. A bummer as this felt really comfortable and the "34 brown" color was a perfect nude shade for underneath white clothes for tan skin.

name: AIRism Ribbed Sleeveless Top (Mame Kurogouchi)
details: Comfortable AIRism with the elegance of silk. With its gorgeous silhouette and details, this top looks great all on its own.A collaboration item with Mame Kurogouchi, a Japanese fashion brand whose beauty of design to enhance every woman’s body is attracting attention all over the world.- AIRism blended with silk.- Ribbed sleeveless top with a charming silhouette and details.- This versatile top makes a great inner or outer layer.
review_description: I bought these thinking they were the same material as the bra and underwear, but they are actually in a shinny and silky fabric. They feel nice and cool but the way too soft, not the most flattering in my opinion.

I love airism and how cool I feel wearing airism products. The brown color is a nice warm color. It really is a thin undershirt with straps that feel a bit flimsy, but again it serves its cooling purposes as an undershirt! I am happy with the purchase~

This is a lovely, silky ribbed tank that you barely feel. I got it as a layering piece to wear under loose-fitting tops and summer dresses. AIRism comes in different weights and textures, but this is like a whisper and so wonderful in the heat and insufferable humidity of our summers. Because I got it for breathability, I didn't want it to fit too tight. So I was happy that the fit wasn't as snug as the AIRism camisole in the same size. I wore it under a top all day outdoors, and it was an airy treat. It will feel comfortably elegant whatever it's put under.

name: Jean-Michel Basquiat UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
details: Andy Warhol, Jean-Michel Basquiat, and Keith Haring's iconic works on UT.Andy Warhol / Jean-Michel Basquiat / Keith HaringAndy Warhol, Basquiat and Keith Haring laid the foundations of the pop art world. It is a collection using their popular masterpieces that still do not fade.Jean-Michel BasquiatAn icon of New York in the 1980s, Jean-Michel Basquiat became renowned during his short career for works inspired by his early street art and a distinctive iconography often connected to art history. His paintings, drawings, and prints drew on a diverse range of sources, from African, Aztec, and Greek cultures to Americana in the form of jazz, baseball, and social and political events.© Estate of Jean-Michel Basquiat. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
review_description: Great artist, great quality no complaints. For a more fitted look go one size down runs true to mens size.

I went to the store to buy this shirt , they only had small sizes the Large was like a medium , so I went online and ordered a XXL when I got it , it was more like an XL ! I wanted to return it for a Triple X. to give me a little more room , but just my luck XXL and XXXL are out of stock ! Not good , what's up with these stores and not having larger sizes ? Every one is not very small ! Now I'm stuck with this so call XXL , which is more like a regular Large !
Highly recommended. Superb print. Comfortable fit and feel.

name: Gen Hoshino UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
details: Gen Hoshino is an artist of many talents. This new and special UT collection is filled with his creativity.GEN HOSHINOThis is the first collaboration between UT and Gen Hoshino, who is a talented musician, actor, and writer. With motifs of his own music, hand-drawn illustrations, photographs, and the mysterious and popular character "Akira Nise" design, you can feel his creativity throughout this collection.Gen HoshinoBorn in 1981 in Saitama, Japan, Gen Hoshino is a genre-crossing musician, actor, and author whose career as a solo artist began with the 2010 release of his first solo album “Baka no Uta.” His ability to excel in a wide range of fields is highly touted both in and outside Japan.Akira NiseThe birthdate, birthplace, and even the gender of this songwriter, author, and part-timer are unknown. What is known is Akira Nise is Gen Hoshino’s friend, confidant, and frequent collaborator in works and shows. Akira Nise’s most famous song is “Real”.© 2021 Amuse lnc. All rights reserved.

review_description: It fits perfectly. The fabric quality is better than I expected

I personally like my shirts to have a slightly tighter fit, so size down if that’s what you prefer as well. Shirt is so cute!! The red is very vibrant and the print is good quality!!! Fav shirt I own, probably gonna buy the whole line friends collection now tbh
I am 5'2", 145 lbs and ordered L size. Runs a little large, suggest to tumble dry to shrink. Medium size should work better. Feel very comfortable.

name: Saul Leiter UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
details: The streets of New York as captured by Saul Leiter, the pioneer of color photography, are now available in our UT lineup.Saul LeiterSaul Leiter began taking color photographs in the 1940s, when black-and-white photography was the norm. This collaboration includes a special photo T-shirt collection featuring a selection of his early signature photos that capture the mystical beauty of everyday life from unique angles, juxtaposed with some of his quotes.Saul LeiterSaul Leiter is a legendary photographer who spent most of his life in New York City. His work appeared in well-known fashion magazines in the 1950s and 1960s, but he stepped away from the front line in the 1980s. His photo collection Early Color was released in 2006, when he was 82 years old, and was a major hit as he rose to prominence as a pioneer of color photography. Retrospectives and publications featuring Saul Leiter continue to be presented around the world, and a documentary film was released in 2013. Saul Leiter passed away in 2013. Iconic works from his vast collection of approximately 80,000 photographs have been carefully selected for his first apparel collaboration in the world, with UT.Purple Umbrella, 1950s©Saul Leiter Foundation

name: SPY x FAMILY UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
details: The popular TV animation "SPY x FAMILY" is now here in UT!SPY x FAMILYThe long-awaited TV anime version of the manga "SPY x FAMILY" serialized in "Shonen Jump Plus" (Shueisha) is airing in 2022. The story is about a skilled spy named "Twilight," his telepathic daughter Anya, who can read minds, and his assassin wife Yor, who hides her true identity from the world.© TE/S, SFP
review_description: Just a pretty normal tee. The fabric is really nice and soft. I really love this show and I just finished it. When I saw that Uniqlo was doing a collab with Spy x Family, I had to snatch one for myself.
The shirt fits great, not too tight or too loose. It stays fresh in 115 heat which is amazing and the material feels soft.
I really like the shirt! It is very nice looking with hood quality material, soft and not so thick. It is perfect, I went with the size it recommended me and It’s just right.

name: SPY x FAMILY UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
details: The popular TV animation "SPY x FAMILY" is now here in UT!SPY x FAMILYThe long-awaited TV anime version of the manga "SPY x FAMILY" serialized in "Shonen Jump Plus" (Shueisha) is airing in 2022. review_description: It was crazy to see how much this shirt sold out on the day of its release and how it ended up out of stocks a few times. Luckily I was able to get my hands on it and this shirt is really nice. Always killing it with the quality material of the shirts they’re producing. I also love the pocket of the shirt and the Spy x Family title logo on the back. It may be chaotic at first when trying to purchase but it was worth it overall.
Good fit, love the color and design for this shirt. I felt like it appeals to fans of the show with something other than a basic picture slapped onto a shirt.
Color is cute and pocket detail is nice. The print feels like a sticker, not sure if its as good as other prints. Hopefully it lasts.

review_description: Amazing shirt! Great quality and great design! My husband Totally loved it

The huge vinyl on the front is way too big. It's a sweat generator, blocking all airflow. The shirt itself has good quality but the vinyl made it impossible to keep on in the humid regions. Nowhere in the description mentioned the graphics is vinyl.

I didn't realize the pattern on the front was an entire vinyl. Vinyls are never good for airflow. It's ridiculous - black t-shirts are already hot enough under the sun and walking around in this t-shirt feels like somebody pressed a warm towel on my chest. Even sitting still in a room is rather uncomfortable because of this huge slab of vinyl. Even though the fabric feels soft and good quality, the vinyl pattern is horrible. I'll be peeling it off.

name: Jeff Koons UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
details: Sophisticated pop artworks by one of the greatest contemporary artists, Jeff Koons!JEFF KOONSThe modern art master is well known for his works such as 'Balloon Dog' and 'Rabbit'. Using everyday motifs, the collection incorporates several of Koons’s iconic artworks in which empowerment and transcendence are communicated through his artistry. This collaboration celebrates 'Jeff Koons: Lost in America', the artist's first exhibition in the Gulf region, opening in Qatar in November 2021.Born in 1955, in York, Pennsylvania, Jeff Koons is a contemporary artist based in New York. Since his first solo exhibition in 1980, his works have been exhibited in major museums, galleries, and cultural institutions around the world, including Rockefeller Center, the Palace of Versailles, the Whitney Museum of American Art, and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. He has received numerous awards and honors in recognition of his cultural achievements. Koons is also known as a philanthropist; over the last four decades he has been involved with many causes while also serving on the board of the International Centre for Missing & Exploited Children.©Jeff Koons, In collaboration with Dadu, Children's Museum of Qatar
review_description: As far as how the shirt fits these are big shirts. Sleeves are long. Im a little chubbier right now so this works well for me. I always size down with these shirts. Thick material too.

I ordered 5 shirts in this order. Tried them on prior to washing in cold water all fit fine after washing none of them fit they alls shrunk.

review_description: This will be my go to shirt this summer! Very lightweight and cool. It fits great and I love the stand collar!

review_description: Like the cut but the off white colored one is see-through because of the thin material. Also the armhole is kind of big in the underarm area.

I debated sizes. Uniqlo has improved their sizing. The My Fit tool recommended a size S but I chose XS. It was a tad small, making the front pleats stick out. Trust the size indicator for the Marni women's assortment.

name: Cotton Half Sleeve Shirt
details: A loose-fitting boxy fit with half-length sleeves. Styles perfectly on its own or as a light outer layer.- Made of extra-fine cotton for a soft, casual feel.- In boxy silhouette with half-length sleeves.- Styles on its own or as a light outer layer.- The boxy cut means this shirt looks great when untucked.
review_description: I like this top, but normally wear a L and feel like a M would look better on me (but M is sold out right now). It is approximately 48" chest on the Large, for reference. Otherwise the color and quality are good

name: Cotton Gathered Long-Sleeve Blouse
details: A statement blouse with a gorgeous tiered design.- Lightweight cotton.- Stylish blouse featuring a tiered design and gathered cuffs.- Designed to cover the waist.
review_description: My summer favorite blouse, I love it and wear every week!

I could wear a small but bought medium because I prefer a very loose fit. The style is almost ageless and very feminine. The cotton is like a fine handkerchief fabric and I can wear a camisole underneath for warmth. I wore the orange one today and lost count of the many compliments received from other women. I got all three colors on sale and couldn’t be more satisfied with this blouse.

I like how light and airy this shirt is but when held up against the light you can practically see through it. It’s nice I guess for summer and it feels great on the skin but have to watch out for the under garment worn with it

name: Rayon Dolman 3/4-Sleeve Blouse
details: Loose-fitting cut showcases the texture of the fabric. Stylish looks plus easy care.- Wrinkle-resistant for easy care.- Smooth rayon fabric.- Dolman sleeves.- A versatile blouse that looks great with both casual and dressy styles.
review_description: Fabric is so soft and color is pretty I order 3 more on second time in same color
Very flowy and great for the summer. It is a bit transparent for my taste but easy to style
Love the style, fit, material and how classic and simple it is.

name: Extra Fine Cotton Twill Oversized Long-Sleeve Shirt
details: 100% premium cotton with a casual feel. The short length makes this shirt an easy outer layer.- Made of 100% ultra-long cotton fibers with an elegant texture.- Soft and wrinkle-resistant twill fabric.- The fabric has been processed to give it a soft, luxurious yet casual feel.- The oversized cut works well on its own or as an outer layer.- Sleeve seams match the direction of the arms.- Design features a straight hem, slits in the sides, and tape on the back of the placket, making it suitable as an outer layer.- Striped pattern.- Looks great styled alone for an oversized look.
review_description: I love this shirt! It’s super stylish and can be worn with a variety of different pieces. Can be layered or stand-still.
i fully expected to need the XL but i think i'll reorder this in a M. The fabric is just superb!

I first saw this shirt on sale online but didn't buy cuz of the reviews. HOWEVER, after seeing it in store, I tried it on. it was just the style I wanted! a perfect layer for spring/fall weather in NYC.

name: Cotton Stand Collar Long-Sleeve Shirt

review_description: This shirt is a bit wide and short. It fits me perfectly because I usually wear petite sizes. Also, I usually wear (P)S or (P)M, but this shirt's XXS fits very well too, too! I wish there are more colors.

name: Cotton Checked Half-Sleeve Shirt
details: A loose-fitting boxy cut with half-length sleeves. Styles perfectly on its own or as a light outer layer.- Made of extra-fine cotton for a soft, casual feel.- In a boxy fit with half-length sleeves.- Classic gingham check.- Styles on its own or as a light outer layer.- The boxy cut means this shirt looks great when untucked.
review_description: Bought this one in store so I recommend trying before buying if you can. I usually wear size M, but bought an XS. It’s super cute, cropped, and the fabric is nice too :)

name: Linen-Blend Band Collar 3/4-Sleeve Shirt
details: Band collar shirt with a cool, supple feel. Also works well as a light outer layer.- The smooth texture of rayon meets the cool feel of linen.- Sophisticated natural texture and a soft touch.- A boxy, band collar shirt with 3/4-length sleeves.- Versatile design also styles as an outer layer.- Perfect on its own or as a light outer layer.
review_description: I love this shirt. I think it looks good untucked or tucked in. Material is really light and breathable too. My only problem with it is it's really hard to roll the sleeve up to make it half-sleeve or even 3/4 sleeves. I have short arms so it's a full long-sleeve shirt on me. I still like it though. It's just hard to roll or fold it up. It keeps on getting undone. My solution was to use rubber bands but surely there's an easier way to do it? Maybe if there's a band inside the sleeve that you can button to make it easier? I don't know.

Nice material. White is not see through with a nude bra underneath. Easy shape that is on the boxy side but not oversized. You can either tuck or untuck. Good for hot weather. Size is ok the looser side. I have a medium chest and around size 6 and purchased size S. It is still loose which is how I like my shirts to fir.
The material feels great but if you’re 5 ft 2 in and around 130-149 lbs than do yourself the favor and get a Small instead of a Medium.

name: Cotton Half-Sleeve Shirt
details: A loose-fitting boxy fit with half-length sleeves. Styles perfectly on its own or as a light outer layer.- Made of extra-fine cotton for a soft, casual feel.- In boxy silhouette with half-length sleeves.- Styles on its own or as a light outer layer.- The boxy cut means this shirt looks great when untucked.
review_description: This is a great business meets artist style button up. The sleeves are amazing

Button ups tend to be a little too tight either in chest or in arms but this one was perfect! No need to pull down sleeves; falls perfect above elbow and landed right at belly button. Oversized fit but still tailored! LOVED it- will be buying another.

I was on the fence about ordering this but went for it and I love it. It’s not the highest quality fabric but I love the cut. I did size down, Uniqlo stuff tends to run large, especially in “oversized” items. I ordered a small and I’m a 10/12 in dresses.

review_description: Nice shirt with bright yellow color, good quality and comfortable to wear. Love it.
I got this today and fell in love! You can definitely wear different ways- from work to casual! I like how light and airy it feels

name: Pleated Sleeveless Blouse (MARNI)
details: A soft cotton blouse with airy tucks. *Purchases for resale are strictly prohibited.Timeless essentials, remixed.- Soft 100% cotton lawn fabric.- The front tucks easily neaten up with an iron after washing.- Sleeveless blouse with distinctive tucks at the front.- Buttons at the back.- Side slits allow for styling with voluminous bottoms.- Hand-painting UNIQLO and MARNI print pattern.
review_description: Perfect for the summer months and super chic. This top is a great pairing for jeans, skirt, shorts, whatever. An upgrade to your usual summer top.

This top is vibrant, lightweight, comfortable, and adorable. I found that it was true to size--I'm on the busty side and wear either size medium or large (US 8-10), but medium worked for me. While it's a purposely flowy top, I wouldn't size down more because then the pleats wouldn't lay correctly. My only complaint is that I wish the pattern matched at the seams, especially for a collaboration with a brand like Marni! In my experience, Uniqlo is usually pretty good about patterns matching at the seams, so this was a bit of a disappointment.
Not like anything I have in my closet. It fits well because it runs large. Wonderful style.

review_description: I really love this top but the neckline for me is a bit lower than pictured and it’s hard to wear a bra with straps because it shows. Really cute top though. I normally wear an XL in shirts but this ran big on me

The material is very thin, you might want to get the patterned one to cover it up. If you wear a bra, it will show! The fit is fine, but if you're not into see through material, do not get this color!
The style is pretty cute, but heads up, the fabric is very, very thin.

review_description: Really one of the best T shirt I can own looking for years for this type of simplicity and feel
Love these…Great value and they do get softer as you wear them. Hope they release more colors
Not many red options so this one is a must. Wish it was in the airism tshirts

name: Smooth Cotton Dolman 3/4-Sleeve T-Shirt
fabric:
449103: Body: 100% Cotton/ Rib: 63% Cotton, 37% Polyester
441832:Body: 100% Cotton/ Rib: 65% Cotton, 35% Polyester

review_description: I have broad shoulders and a short torso. This really got me well and is flattering! I proceeded to buy a white one!!
I’m pretty used to form-fitting tops, but this one is definitely super chic!

I love the fabric and the interesting shape of the shirt but it's a little bit too large for me, to a point that I look like a fancy potato sack if I get careless. Would buy it again but would definitely size down.

name: U AIRism Relaxed Crew Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt

review_description: The product runs large and has no shape to it, which is a bit disappointing, but to me the most disappointing aspect is the feel of the product, which is not at all what one expects from a T-shirt; there is too much a feeling of polyester and not of cotton.

I love the color and the material but it was just too big for me. I think the style was already loose fit but UNIQLO suggested I order XL so I did. But it was too loose on me. Looked like I was wearing a sack. Maybe I just have really short arms but these were more of a 3/4 sleeve on me.
Great quality, oversized, I am usually size S but had to size down.

details: A comfortable T-shirt with a stylish mock neck and asymmetric hem design.From a collaboration with our Fast Retailing sister brand, Theory.- The look of cotton with AIRism performance.- Mock neck design.- Features a slightly boxy cut and shorter length.- Side slits and asymmetric hem add a style accent.- Perfect for mixing and matching with jackets and pants from the collection.
review_description: This top is so flattering, lightweight and easy to care for - I wear it, and hurry to wash it so I can wear it again!

Was excited to see a short sleeve mock neck, and while I expected the hem to be shorter, it's too short. You can't reach overhead without exposing your stomach, it's also impossible to keep the shirt tucked in. Please make a unisex/men's short-sleeve version of the soft touch mock neck instead. I'd rather not need an undershirt for an AIRism piece.
but I think the t-shirt is too short. It feels like one of those cropped t-shirts. d

review_description: I was looking for a body oversized polo shirt and this hits everything I was looking for. The material feels good and substantial and the fit is spot on

review_description: The top runs very oversized - even my chubby kids didn’t fir in a small

name: Ribbed Sleeveless Cropped Top
details: A 100% cotton, cropped top that's great to wear on its own or layered.- Soft, smooth 100% Supima® cotton.- Ribbed for a sophisticated look.- With UV Protection technology.- Machine-washable.- Fitted cut with a comfortable ribbed finish.- Featuring the signature refined look of knitted fabric.
review_description: It's so cute, and it fits so well. It looks like something Kendall Jenner would wear. The material is thin, so I'm not sure how long it'll hold up. I got it in white and tried it on with a black bra. I can somewhat see the bra through it, but it's definitely not see-through. I could wear the black bra under it in public.

In reference to the review before this, I actually think this tank works great with having a larger chest (I'm 32F to be specific). The L fits, looks, and feels great. This is cropped, of course, but I would not say *too* cropped at all.... Honestly my new favorite tank, I came on here to buy another in white but I had to respond to the other review so that others wouldn't be dissuaded. It's a great tank!!!
The crops were not this short before! I’ve had so many in different colors. I can’t imagine someone with bigger busts to wear these comfortably (I’m a 34B for reference).

name: Cotton Striped Shirred Sleeveless Blouse
fabric: Body: 100% Cotton/ Shirring Part: 55% Polyester, 45% Spandex
details: An airy blouse in lightweight fabric. The frills and shirring make the design look great on its own.- Lightweight 100% cotton.- Delicate ruffles and shirring.- Cropped length.
review_description: to be honest it's not really the kind of thing i usually wear, but i thought it was nice and summery so i got it anyway! received multiple compliments on it, and it looks really flattering on me. the only thing is that the straps might feel a little loose but honestly i like that so!

name: Cotton Shirred Sleeveless Blouse
fabric: Body: 100% Cotton/ Shirring Part: 55% Polyester, 45% Spandex
details: An airy blouse in lightweight fabric. The frills and shirring make the design look great on its own.- Lightweight 100% cotton.- Delicate ruffles and shirring.- Cropped length.
review_description: Like other reviews have mentioned, the straps, though adjustable, are still too loose and slide off easily. I've tried criss-crossing them, taping them down... nothing works.
It shrunk after 1 wash. It shrunk after 1 wash.

The body of the shirt fits me like a glove due to the elastic nature of the shirred material. However, I am not a huge fan of a few things: 1) I don't favor the cropped length, only because I would personally like to wear it with mid-rise pants without showing my stomach. 2) I don't like the feeling of how the material bunches up in the armpit area. It feels like it will probably harbor a lot of sweat and deodorant stains throughout the day. 3) My least favorite thing is the adjustable straps. Even on the shortest setting, the straps still somehow slip and fall if the shirt isn't positioned a certain way. This brings a lot of my focus back to the shirt as I wear it and it is very distracting which makes it uncomfortable to wear.

name: Slub Jersey Sleeveless T-Shirt
details: Cotton slub with a unique, tasteful texture.- Cotton slub with a unique, tasteful texture.- Varied yarn for a soft texture and lightness.- Regular length top with an open scoop neck.- Looks great tucked in to high-waisted jeans or paired with leggings for a sporty look.
review_description: I should have read the reviews. I normally wear size Small so I ordered Small. However, these do run small so I suggest going a size up. The material is on the harder side, not the usual Uniqlo soft side. Overall, it's a good tank top and I wear to sleep for some colors.

I got this in pink to wear at home but I like it so much that I think I might also wear this outside maybe under a cardigan with jeans. It's very comfortable, and I like that it's short enough for me that I don't have to tuck it under my pants or skirt. I'm usually a size M or S at Uniqlo; this was good in S for me since I like my sleeveless t-shirts to be a little more fitting. I haven't tried washing this yet so I'm not sure if it'll shrink too much but for now I'm very satisfied with what I've got. Happy that I was able to get it on sale too.

I’m between a S and M and ordered 2 Ms (green and gray) for a looser fit, and yikes were they small. The armhole cut is snug and they’re pretty short. I do have a chest (size C) so maybe that’s the reason? I wanted to love these since they could be such a staple and a great price, but think I’ll be trying other tanks

details: A versatile Henley neck top in ribbed fabric for a comfortable fit.- Cotton ribbed fabric.- Squarish open scoop neckline.- Cropped length pairs well with high-rise jeans, leggings, and pants.- Henley neck allows different styling options.
review_description: Love this as a cute, basic cropped tank. The material is a lot thinner than expected so keep that in mind when choosing colors. I will be returning the white since it feels a little too sheer for comfort and doesn't look as premium.

I never wear crop tops but I decided to try this for an under layer for shirts or dresses with large armholes when I don't want to tuck anything in. I like that the buttons help break up the bust line. I'm 32 DDD and the Small fit really nicely under the arms and it is very comfortable -- a surprise! So I got several colors. I noticed more uniqlo crop tops but did not try them because it is so much work to order and return. This one is just fine.

I love the quality of this tank top and the fact that it comes in so many colors! I bought the purple one in store and had to get an extra small because it runs large in my opinion. I always buy a size small in Uniqlo clothes so just keep that in mind if you're ordering online. Otherwise, it's great!

name: Keith Haring UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
details: Andy Warhol, Jean-Michel Basquiat, and Keith Haring's iconic works on UT.Andy Warhol / Jean-Michel Basquiat / Keith HaringAndy Warhol, Basquiat and Keith Haring laid the foundations of the pop art world. It is a collection using their popular masterpieces that still do not fade.Keith HaringA key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,” with abstract marks and patterning.© Keith Haring Foundation. review_description: I'm 5'-9" and got the XL. I do generally get long jeans from uniqlo, but for some reason that isn't an option for pregnant people. They also came with an "alteration" stamp on the label, so I'm curious if I was sent someone else's returned tailored pants. They really don't fit in the crotch either, it was a struggle to get them up. I wouldn't buy these again, but need pants for now, I would not recommend them to anyone else.

name: Sweatpants
details: Now in even softer sweat fabric. Bringing together the best of traditional and on-trend details.-Updated with soft and airy fabric.- Design accents like a gathered waist and hems are inspired by classic sweatpants.- An on trend, relaxed cut keeps you comfortable.- Pairs perfectly with any top.- Hems with an elastic band keep cold wind out- Wear with our Relaxed Sweatshirt for a matching sweat set.
review_description: I had an old pair of these sweats before they were redesigned. I loved everything about the new design except the hemming. The old style had the typical 3 inch gathered hem but these are more of a loose bubble hem. The issue is I’m short and the old hem would keep the extra fabric up above my ankles no problem. But these just pool at my feet so I can’t wear them out with shoes without stepping on the excess fabric. So I just wear these at home.

Sized up from medium to large because I wanted a wider fit on the calves. The oversized fit is perfect without giving you the classic sweatpant butt. This one is actually pretty flattering. Good thickness for spring in the northeast. Overall great, will probably get a second pair in dark grey!
It fits perfectly, It's really sturdy and love the color!

name: HEATTECH Pile-Lined Sweatpants
fabric: Body: 66% Polyester, 19% Acrylic, 15% Rayon/ Rib: 58% Cotton, 39% Polyester, 3% Spandex
details: Our winter pants have been updated for a lighter, warmer, and softer feel.- HEATTECH with bio-warming and insulating features.- The facing and lining of the boa is integrated to improve warmth, lightness, and comfort.- HEATTECH pants lined with boa fleece.- We’ve updated our HEATTECH fabric to make it even warmer.
review_description: I bought this during a cold spell and for that they worked very well. the fabric is very soft and comfortable . however the first pair I ordered, according to their size chart, XXL are too big so ordered the XL the second time. they are smallish. the crotch length is quite short so I need to pull them up all the time. I am keeping both for the warmth and fabric but they really need to adjust the size chart and the actual pants sizing cut.
I loved these sweatpants, I will probably buy them in another color, they are soo cozy, just a tiny bit big but it's ok.

I've purchased the pile lined sweatpants a few times in the past. In the past XS was just right and S was a little looser. I bought 3 pairs of XS March 2021 on sale, and the XS this year was oversized both in bagginess and in length. I wear them for comfort and warmth inside the house and on walks so I don't mind too much, but i wish they keep the style and sizing consistent.

name: Ultra Light Pants
details: Incredibly lightweight, stretchy, and comfortable pants with a sleek cut. Perfect for the office and casual wear.- Stretch fabric with an elegant texture.- Amazingly lightweight and comfortable fabric, jointly developed with Toray Industries.- Quick-drying and wrinkle resistant for easy care.- Versatile and flattering slim-fit pants.- Waist measurements in centimeters available.- Stretch waist for easy movement.- Ideal for casual and business wear.
review_description: I wear XS in the smart and ezy pants. I ordered this in a size 2 and it was too loose at the waist and legs. A size 0 would’ve fit better. The waist is oversized.

I love love the design and fit of this. I have no problem for the material. To me its very light and very food for summer. The length is perfect for me. I normally wear a size 4, but size 2 fits better for me. I got one in beige and planning to get the rest colors. Thats how much I love it
Loose, comfortable pants. The pants are very lightweight

name: Final Fantasy VI UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
details: In celebration of its 35th anniversary in 2022, designs featuring 16 titles from the globally acclaimed series are coming to UT.FINAL FANTASY 35TH ANNIVERSARYSince the first title’s 1987 release, this series has been highly acclaimed for its cutting-edge graphics, unique worldviews, and rich storylines. All Rights Reserved.
review_description: To the person who wrote about Terra's name being wrong on the shirt..technically her name is Tina in the Japanese version. When the game was brought over to North America her name was changed to Terra. So it's not wrong. :\
I loved the color of this one in particular, not super crazy about bright colors. Medium fit me well. Doesn't deserve the bad reviews for using the Japanese name for the protagonist...
Was so excited to receive this shirt, but it wasn’t until I opened my package that I realized they put Terra (the main characters name) as Tina. Very sad because this is the best FF game.

details: In celebration of its 35th anniversary in 2022, designs featuring 16 titles from the globally acclaimed series are coming to UT.FINAL FANTASY 35TH ANNIVERSARYSince the first title’s 1987 release, this series has been highly acclaimed for its cutting-edge graphics, unique worldviews, and rich storylines. review_description: I was so excited when this shirt dropped (especially since I’m im the middle of playing FFVII) and this being my first time buying from UNIQLO, I was worried about the size since I like having my shirts loose (I normally buy L or XL but through it’s sizing questionnaire it recommended me an M). However, the size proved to be absolutely perfect and fit me exactly how I wanted it! Words can’t describe how much I love this shirt, especially with how crisp and clean the designs are plus the fabric feels comfortable. 100% would recommend for any FF fans out there :)

Uniqlo shirts always have such great quality and they're very comfortable, so I am always pleased when I ordered them. Shipping was pretty quick, but the only thing I am little disappointed about is that they said if you order more than 2 shirts you could get the FF cards in your order and I ordered 2 shirts real quick as soon as they were available to order, so I just assume I would be one of the lucky ones to receive those cards in my order. Sadly, I did not, but I still don't regret my purchase and very happy that I got them.
Very comfortable, beautiful graphic image on the front. Can't complain.

name: SPY x FAMILY UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
details: The popular TV animation "SPY x FAMILY" is now here in UT!SPY x FAMILYThe long-awaited TV anime version of the manga "SPY x FAMILY" serialized in "Shonen Jump Plus" (Shueisha) is airing in 2022. The story is about a skilled spy named "Twilight," his telepathic daughter Anya, who can read minds, and his assassin wife Yor, who hides her true identity from the world.© TE/S, SFP
review_description: Obviously a Spy x Family fan and this lived up to my hype for the collab. I ordered M and with my build, I do like a little bit of room in my clothing and when I first tried it on, it did just that. I think it did shrink in the wash (could be my mind if it did or not) but the print remained unaffected and the material did not stain or change how it felt.

It fit very well. I usually go for medium in shirts, but it recommended small. I’m glad I listened. It is slightly more fitted than what I normally buy, but it was a plus. It was still loose while not being baggy. It is also great quality and washed well. I air dried to be safe but it probably could be dried.
This shirt is great for all Spy x Family fans. The sizing is perfect, and the design on the shirt looks nice.

review_description: I actually wish I could find the same model in regular pants, but seems like Uniqlo discontinued this line. Perfect pants

name: +J Dry Sweatpants
fabric: Body: 80% Polyester, 15% Rayon, 5% Spandex/ Rib: 88% Cotton, 12% Polyester
details: Sweat pants with a sophisticated cut.UNIQLO’s Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.- Detailed seamline.- Eyelets with an embossed +J logo.- DRY technology.- Soft sweat fabric with grosgrain details on the back.
review_description: Nice color and fit + details but I returned it because I didn't like it with the hoodie because it was too short (hoodie)
This pant is really nice. I love it, perfect for the cold weather. The style looks great. I like it more fit. I normally wear M but I decide to change to S.
So comfy, so stylish, and washable! The color is not too white, very good white in the winter.

name: Wide Straight Pants
fabric: [30Natural] 64% Polyester, 30% Rayon, 6% Spandex [Other Colors] 66% Polyester, 28% Rayon, 6% Spandex
details: Stretchy fabric with a gathered waist. Comfort and easy care.- 2-Way stretch fabric stretches vertically and horizontally.- Made of light polyester rayon with an elegant drape.- Wrinkle-resistant for easy care.- Comfortable elastic waist design.- Gathers around the waist for a casual look.- Center pleats for a clean look.- Wide, straight cut.- Perfect for dressing up or down.
review_description: I am a male, and I LOVE these pants. I got an XL and they are long but not a big deal. I have a wide waist and finding good wide pants that fit good has never happened for me, until now. I could wear these in 95 degree heat or even sleep in these. They have such versatility as well, dress up or down. Getting more soon for sure!

These are nice. They are lightweight, comfortable and can be worn with most of my other clothes. The material seems nice. I will need to get them hemmed about a cuff length, but the price was reasonable. I found them true to size in Uniqlo clothing.

I am curvy size 14/16 and for the ankle stretch pants I am a comfortable XXL. I was wrong for this pant. These pants run big I can go down to my regular size XL with a nice loose fit and not too tight. I will rerun and buy my size. I wish returns were free but the pants at Uniqlo are the only brand that fits perfect so i continue to shop here. Great quality. For summer, light weight and adjustable waist string . A little long I’m 5’5 but will get them hemmed. Good buy!

name: Silfeel Jogger Pants
details: Comfy single tuck pants with sleek hems. In an elegant fabric for a refined style.- Smooth twill fabric with an elegant drape.- Laid-back jogger pants with a smooth, comfortable feel.- Wrinkle-resistant for easy care.- Single-tuck design.- Sleek, tapered jogger cut.- Elastic hems for easy movement.- Versatile design that easily dresses up or down.
review_description: Nice cloth but it has wierd fit. Like the legs are too loose but so tight on the waist. Plus Uniqlo’s return method is a pain on top of not being free. so total waste of money.

I had these pants in a size small from several years ago and they were really big around the waist. They were almost falling down. I usually wear a small in pants but I wanted to try the XS. When I first tried on the XS the elastic in the back seemed tight but I wore them all day and they were perfectly comfortable. They look dressy and nice enough for work. The fabric is softer and silkier than my older pair. The elastic around the hem goes all the way around. On my old pair the front hem was smooth and the elastic was only in the back. The length is fine even though I am short. Not sure what they would be like on someone tall. I bought all three colors - navy blue, black and beige. I would probably buy more colors if available. These are great summer pants for work.
Super nice material, perfect for wearing to the office. I’m 5’ and they are a little long on me but the elastic at the ankles helps it stay put.

name: AIRism UV Protection Active Soft Leggings
details: A redesigned fit to improve comfort. More coverage offers protection from UV rays. UPF40- AIRism with quick-drying and Cool-Touch features.High-performance leggings that aren't see-through and are perfect for casual wear.- Updated the fit around the waist to provide extra comfort.
review_description: I bought a pair of leggings 2 years ago, same style, but without pockets. They are slowly falling apart, so I decided to get a new pair, assuming they will fit the same. Sadly, they don't. :( Compared to the previous model the waist is really stiff/tight, rolling down and overall they seem smaller, even though they are the same size. The material is the same, which I like. I have a white haired dog and that material is a life saver - nothing sticks and it's easy to remove. Like other mentioned, I do miss the option to get leggings without pockets. I hope you'll bring them back one day.

Bought two pairs of these leggings for full price and at first I was super excited about them but after 2 washes, I’ve noticed that the stitching is starting to become undone on both pairs. Keep in mind, I wash these inside laundry bags in the gentle cycle. I also wanted to mention that they do have a tendency to lose its shape and I have to pull them back to my waist, which defeats the purpose of wearing leggings. Overall, I don’t think they’re worth the full price.
The pants fit well and feel great. The only problem is that the waist wide band sometimes folds. This is my second pair, so despite the folding I love the pants.

name: Ultra Stretch High-Rise Leggings Pants
details: High-rise waist provides a flattering effect. Updated design makes styling easy.- Made with Ultra Stretch fabric.- With DRY technology.- High-rise cut for a leg-lengthening effect.- We’ve updated the pocket size, stitch work, and buttons to achieve a more versatile design.
review_description: Perfect fit and very comfortable. I will definitely buy other colors.

Very disappointed. I usually don't have a problem with these pants but after wearing them 3x they ripped right below the cheek. The material was completely worn away and it was only on that part. The rest of the jeans looked brand new. I was wearing a size M but can fit into a S.

These pants are amazing. The front pockets don’t work which is too bad, but I still have to give them 5 stars because I wear them all the time. I bought these in the cropped and heat tech versions as well, but the hw ones are my go-to because they are so flattering and comfortable. They are a fantastic basic. You can bend over without fear they’ll become see through and the stretch makes them easy and comfortable.

name: Linen-Blend Skort
fabric: [01Off White] Shell: 43% Rayon, 34% Linen, 23% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyester [Other Colors] 43% Rayon, 34% Linen, 23% Polyester
details: An airy skort with the natural feel of linen blend fabric.- Linen blend fabric.- Pants that look like a skirt and are easy to move in.
review_description: It's really comfortable and nice airy material. I already have it in black as well.

Convenient, flattening wear with all kinds of tops, easy to dress up or down, lightweight and breathable. A line design is good for all body types. This is the only bottom I've been wearing since summer, and I stock up immediately when they are on sale.
Honestly. It’s so flattering and comfortable. It goes with everything! I am 109lb and XS fits nicely. Please restock the beige and white! I would buy them in a heartbeat!

name: Denim Jersey Shorts
details: Relaxed, easy shorts with a casual design.- Soft, comfortable jersey fabric.- Indigo-dyed yarn produces a tasteful color tone.- Updated with a drawstring on the outside for a functional and stylish design.- Elastic waist.- Design with a relaxed feel.- Convenient patch pockets on the side and back.- Double-stitched on the pockets and hems for a more casual design.- Casual and practical shorts that will keep you comfortable all day long.
review_description: Feels as comfortable, soft, and slightly thicker like swear shorts. I love the jean blue color and length is great! A really nice pair of casual shorts for outdoors and indoors.

I ordered the cream one and I absolutely love it! Wore it on a summer day in humid Florida and was not uncomfortable at all. It's true to size and still adjustable on the waist. The legs little bit baggy though so make sure you're wearing cycling shorts underneath if you're going to lounge in it.
I love the new style and the denim color. It’s comfortable and the material is great.

name: Sweat Shorts
details: Fashionable shorts in soft, airy sweat fabric.- Soft, puffy sweat fabric.- Fashionable cut with elastic hems.
review_description: Some of the most comfortable shorts I have ever worn. I love them. I have these in two colors and I want more haha they are very comfortable and I've managed to dress them up to wear them out. Good quality and the fit is immaculate

I ended up buying 2 pairs an L and XL. I wear a M but I like sweats really loose. These are so soft but still thick enough. The white pair are not thick enough to hide if you’re wearing black underwear (FYI). I’ve worn these every single weekend. They have a nice casual but preppy look. I dress them up with a open button up and it’s perfect for family summer dinners..
The material is soft and comfy, tho a bit thick. I'm usually size M but it looks so baggy on me and I probably should've sized down.

name: Ultra Light Tucked Easy Shorts (Theory)
details: UNIQLO performance meets Theory’s stylish design.From a collaboration with our Fast Retailing sister brand, Theory.- Made from UNIQLO’s unique fabric jointly developed with Toray.- Quick-drying, stretchy, lightweight fabric with a soft feel.- Functional easy shorts with a drawstring waist.- Theory’s signature clean lines create a sleek look.- Stretchy and lightweight fabric for incredibly easy movement.
review_description: I was able to get both white and black in size small. The white one fits perfectly while the black one is a little tight. The waist of the black one is about 1 inch smaller than the white one. The material of the white one is softer than the black one.
Quality wise it was a good purchase, but I thought it was a bit small for me. I usually wear S and I bought size S. I am 164cm 64kg / 5'4.5'' 140lb Hope this helps!

These shorts fit me so well! the pockets are spacious and the shorts have a sporty feel. The shorts let the air circulate well so you can definitely wear this during the spring/summer. It's spacious and doesn't stick to you. It also looks really nice since it's pleated.

name: 3D Knit Ribbed Back Slit Skirt (Mame Kurogouchi)
details: A collaboration item with Mame Kurogouchi, a Japanese fashion brand whose beauty of design to enhance every woman’s body is attracting attention all over the world.A collaboration item with Mame Kurogouchi, a Japanese fashion brand whose beauty of design to enhance every woman’s body is attracting attention all over the world.- Viscose-nylon blend.- Crisp, non-clingy fabric with plenty of stretch.- Straight cut.- Angled ribbing pattern at the midsection creates a flattering visual effect.- Wide-ribbed knit fabric.- Back slit for a light, airy feel.- Versatile design pairs well with any top.
review_description: This skirt is everything I would want in a knit, body-hugging style. The fabric and knit are thick and luxurious and the ribbing is angled to curve along the hips. The only thing is that the length hits at my ankles and is too long for my preference (height 5' 3").

name: Balloon-Shaped Skirt (MARNI)
details: Airy balloon cut. A versatile skirt that adds volume to any outfit. Please note that customer purchases are limited to: 1 piece per item per person. *Purchases for resale are strictly prohibited.Timeless essentials, remixed.- Cotton-based fabric.- Distinctive balloon silhouette.- Angled pleats from the waist to the hem create a contoured look.- Easy-waist design.- Side pockets.
review_description: This balloon skirt has a bit of weight, partly from the gathering and the lining. I'd have preferred a lighter weight cotton lining instead of polyester. But it's airy as the construction tends to push the skirt away from the body. Gathered at the waist, which adds a more bulk there (not visible in the photos with models as they're wearing a long T), but the diagonal gathers keep the bulk down a bit and make it drape nicely. The skirt on me is just below the knees,perfect for this style. The 69 navy color indoors is a lovely indigo, in outdoor sunlight has a bit of a purplish cast to it. I wanted the splashier red & white version but it was out of stock so ordered navy skirt to try the fit (I sized down one). The pockets are deep enough to securely hold a change purse,keys, smart phone. In this color, it's a unique alternative to jeans. Looks good with a shorter T shirt or fitted tops to show more detail. 3 seasons wear for me. I'll keep it! Would love it in fluid silk!
